history.proof: intros fbar H xbar. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. qsimpl time: 1 use: quotient_projection_correct.

exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Type R : Relation A f : A -> B equiv : equivalence R well_defined : forall x y : A, R x y -> f x = f y fbar : quotient R -> B H : forall x : A, fbar (quotient_projection R x) = f x xbar : quotient R The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "relation ?A".

original: intros fbar H xbar. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. simpl. rewrite (quotient_projection_correct A R). remember (constructive_definite_description (fun y : B => exists x : A, proj1_sig (quotient_projection R x) = xbar /\ f x = y) (description_of_fbar xbar)) as y eqn:Heqy. symmetry in Heqy. destruct Heqy as [H1 H2]. rewrite H1. apply eq_sym. apply H2.
